data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kanana, Yuliia, Riutort, Marta (2019): First record of freshwater planarian Girardia igrina (Platyhelminthes, Tricladida, Continenticola) in Eastern Europe. Zootaxa 4624 (4): 597-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4624.4.13|1 occurrence
